embed.title: 1!setpl
embed.description: Using `null` as the value will clear that type.

fields.name: 1!setpl historyevent [player] [event]
fields.value: Adds an item a player's status history.

fields.name: 1!setpl status [player] [status]
fields.value: Sets a player's status. Common statuses: <:verified:726833035999182898> Verified, ⚠️ Scammer, ⛔ BANNED.
